text: Pierrepont Manor is a hamlet and census-designated place in Jefferson County, New York. In 2020, 212 people lived in Pierrepont Manor. Pierrepont Manor has a post office with the ZIP code of 13674, which opened on November 29, 1843. U.S. Route 11 and New York State Route 193 come together in the community. Pierrepont Manor is also connected to Interstate 81. == Geography == Pierrepont Manor has an area of . of the land is land and is water. == References == Category:Census-designated places in New York (state) Category:Hamlets in New York (state)
title: Pierrepont Manor, New York
